title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union sergeant's uniform with sword seated on a horse] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union sergeant's uniform with sword seated on a horse] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : quarter-plate ambrotype ; 9.4 x 11.0 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Leather, scroll design. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress).
